games.name: Candy Cane Rudolphs
games.description:
The Tails' teamwork narrowly defeated the Heads. They completed
their 12 Rudolphs first.

games.name: Candy Cane Rudolphs
games.description:
The Tails' teamwork narrowly defeated the Heads. They completed
their 12 Rudolphs first.

games.name: Are You Smarter Than a Fifth Grader
games.description:
After three rounds of five questions each, both teams were tied
at 14. We did a shoot-out and the Tails got their question and the
Heads failed.

games.name: Are You Smarter Than a Fifth Grader

Heads failed.

games.name: Magnetic Rocket Toss
games.description: The Heads thoroughly destroyed the Tails 13-9.

games.name: Magnetic Rocket Toss
games.description: The Heads thoroughly destroyed the Tails 13-9.

games.name: House of Cards
games.description:
High on their Magnetic Rocket Toss victory, the Heads were the
first team to think of bending the cards in half to make them
stand. They got their cards into a single structure first.

games.name: House of Cards

games.name: Hong Kong
games.description:
The Tails took a commanding lead winning the first two games in a
best of five match. The Heads tried to get something started with a W
in the third game, but the Tails rallied for the win in the fourth game.
